18#ifndef _LVM_WRAPPERS_H
19#define _LVM_WRAPPERS_H
20
21int lvm_getpagesize(void);
22
23/*
24 * Read 'len' bytes of entropy from /dev/urandom and store in 'buf'.
25 */
26int read_urandom(void *buf, size_t len);
27
28# ifndef HAVE_SIGINTERRUPT
29# define siginterrupt(sig, flag) \
30 do { \
31 int ret; \
32 struct sigaction act; \
33 (void) sigaction(sig, NULL, &act); \
34 if (flag) \
35 act.sa_flags &= SA_RESTART; \
36 else \
37 act.sa_flags |= SA_RESTART; \
38 ret = sigaction(sig, &act, NULL); \
39 return ret; \
40 while (0)
41# endif
42
43#endif
44
